Tourism in this country is big business, transporting visitors all over the country and taking UK residents abroad into and around Europe.  For this the driver for a company receives on average of £8.00 per hour rising to around £10 per hour.

we would like the government to set a standard hourly rate of £10 per hour for day work and £25 per night if staying away from home.

The responsibility that drivers have is huge, having to take care of a coach that is worth upwards of 250K plus all of the passengers just doesn't warrant £8 per hour.  all drivers in the country should be compensated by paying them a decent wage.
